title: Quantum Optics I
description: Basic course on the interaction of light with matter, based on quantum theory.  Applications to the laser and to the study of coherence properties of light.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PHYS 4143 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PHYS  6106 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
